Quel est votre plus haut niveau d'éducat: What is your highest level of education completed?

Avez-vous un diplôme algérien dans les d: Do you you have an Algerian degree in IT fields?

Avez-vous déménagé pour étudier à l'étra: Did you relocate to study abroad?

Avez-vous déménagé pour travailler à l'é: Did you relocate to work abroad?

D’où travaillez-vous principalement ?: From where do you primarily work?

Avez-vous dû déménager dans cette ville: Did you have to travel to that city (wilaya) to work in IT?

Si vous trouvez une meilleure opportunit: If you find a better opportunity to work in a different city (wilaya), would you relocate?

En plus de votre salaire, de quels autre: In addition to your salary, what other benefits or perks do you receive in your current role?

Si vous êtes prêt(e) à quitter le pays,: If you are willing to leave the country, what would be your destination (Leave it empty if not applicable)?

Quelle est votre situation d'emploi actu: What is your current employment status?

Quelle(s) affirmation(s) correspond(ent): Which statement is true for your case (choose more than one if you have a hybrid working model)?

Quel est votre niveau professionnel actu: What is your current professional level?

De combien d’années d’expérience profess: How many years of professional experience do you have in the software engineering field?

Combien de personnes travaillent dans vo: How many people work at your organization, including yourself?

Si vous travaillez pour une entreprise a:
If you are working for an Algerian company, What's your average monthly salary in DZD (Algerian dinars)?

Leave empty if not applicable.

Si vous travaillez pour une entreprise é:
If you are working for a foreign company from Algeria, What's your average yearly gross income in EUR?

Leave empty if not applicable.

Sur une échelle de 1 à 10, à quel point: On a scale from 1 to 10, how satisfied are you with your current job in the software engineering field?

Quels sont les principaux défis auxquels: What are the main challenges you face in your role as a software engineer in Algeria?

Comment êtes-vous arrivé(e) dans le doma: How did you get into the field of software engineering or technology?

Quels langages de programmation utilisez: Which programming languages do you frequently use in your work? (Select all that apply)

Avec quelles bases de données travaillez: Which database engines do you commonly work with? (Select all that apply)

Si applicable, quels services d'hébergem: If applicable, which web hosting services do you use?

Quels frameworks web utilisez-vous ?: Which web frameworks do you use?

Quels frameworks/langages de développeme: Which mobile development frameworks/languages do you use?

Si vous créez des applications de bureau: If you build Desktop applications, what technologies do you use?

Quelle solution de paiement électronique: Which e-payment solution did you use?

Comment décririez-vous votre implication: How would you describe your involvement with open source software development?

Quelle méthodologie de développement log: Which software development methodology you, or your organization use?

Quels outils de collaboration en ligne u: Which online collaboration tools you use for work?

Quels fournisseurs de cloud utilisez-vou: Which cloud providers do you primarily use? (Select all that apply)

Quels systèmes de contrôle de version ut: Which version control systems do you primarily use for managing your software projects?

Quels outils utilisez-vous pour le déplo: What tools do you use for deployment and infrastructure provisioning ?

Quelle technologie CI/CD utilisez-vous ?: Which CI/CD technology do you use?

How did you acquire your IT skills in yo: How did you acquire your IT skills in your specific field? And how did you learn to code?

Dans quelle langue avez-vous principalem: In which language did you primarily learn and acquire your IT skills?

Si vous participez à des communautés tec: If you are involved in or aware of tech communities or meetups in Algeria, please specify the names or types of communities you are associated with or know of:"
